mapper.select: select t.user_id userId,t.amount,t.pay_way payWay,date_format(t.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createTime ,t.trade_type tradeType,t.trade_id tradeId,coin_balance coinBalance,point_balance pointBalance,t.trade_no tradeNo,t2.name goodsName from user_trade_log t left join `order` t1 on (t.trade_id=t1.id) left join goods t2 on (t1.goods_id=t2.id) where t.user_id=#{userId} order by createTime desc,t.id desc
